archimate:BusinessObject.name: BridgingProtocol
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
"Bridging Protocols operate at the data link layer of the OSI model, and are used to define communications over different types of homogeneous and heterogeneous local area networks.
The DEN-ng model defines RSRBridging, SRBridging, SRTBridging, and TransparentBridging as examples of subclasses of this class. "
